title: Behavior of prompt gamma-ray emission in triton and long range alpha particle accompanied fission of Cf-252

x4freetext: Behavior of prompt gamma-ray emission in triton and
long range alpha particle accompanied fission of Cf-252

x4codes.hlp: China Inst. of Atomic Energy, Beijing, China, People`s Rep.

x4codes.shortRef: Jour: Chinese J.of Nuclear Physics (Beijing)., Vol.9, Issue.2, p.113 (1987)

x4freetext: This work is to investigate the depindence of the aver-
age number of the prompt/ gamma rays per fission on the
triton energy and on the energy of the long range alpha
particle(LRA) in the spontaneous fission of Cf-252. The
strong variations of the gamma ray yield with the tri-
ton energy and with the energy of the lra are observed
when the light charged particles have low or extreme
